name: cosmic-lib
description: A javaScript implementation of the CosmicLink protocol
author: MisterTicot

scripts.build-misc: cp -f AUTHORS LICENSE README.md package-lock.json web
scripts.build: sh setenv.sh -p && for i in js css doc html misc; do npm run build-$i || return; done
scripts.check: npm run get && cp web/package-lock.json . && npm ci && npm run build && cd web && git status
scripts.watch: sh setenv.sh -d && npm run build-html && webpack -d --watch
scripts.serve: npm run watch & cd web && live-server --no-browser
